snippet.title: The Five Dumbest Things on Wall Street This Week: Feb. 22
snippet.description:
The Five Dumbest Things on Wall Street This Week: Feb. 22
By Gregg Greenberg 07:00 AM EST 02/22/13
Burger King, Wal-Mart and Heinz make the cut -- to their dismay -- in the list of the biggest business bloopers.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/11848248/1/the-five-dumbest-things-on-wall-street-this-week-feb-22.html

snippet.title: Why BP Is Not Toyota
snippet.description:
Why BP Is Not Toyota
By Daniel Dicker 05:59 AM EDT 07/28/10
In the oil business, you can have the worst environmental disaster in history and still make far more money than you expect.
